Text:
The iTunes Australia Store has relesed it early (I think) not sure why.

Australia - 17 August 2012
Wikipedia - 19 August 2012
United Kingdom - 02 September 2012
United States - (Couldn't find it in the store)

Well that's confusing. :P

The album #3 will be released 10 September 2012 (at least that makes sense).
